name: OR_LNLG_ANEST_INFO
description: This table contains the Anesthesia information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: ANES_INFO_CPT2_ID
columns.description: The second Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) code documented by anesthesia.

columns.name: ANES_INFO_DIAG2_ID
columns.description: The second diagnosis documented by anesthesia.

columns.name: ANES_INFO_MOD2_C_NAME
columns.description: The second CPT code modifier documented by anesthesia.

columns.name: ANES_INFO_MOD3_C_NAME
columns.description: The third CPT code modifier documented by anesthesia.
